member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN1
member.summary: Represents a color glyph run. The IDWriteFactory4.TranslateColorGlyphRun method returns an ordered collection of color glyph runs of varying types depending on what the font supports.

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN1.glyphImageFormat
member.summary: Type of glyph image format for this color run. Exactly one type will be set since TranslateColorGlyphRun has already broken down the run into separate parts.

member.name: DWRITE_COLOR_GLYPH_RUN1.measuringMode
member.summary: Measuring mode to use for this glyph run.
